name: Chinedu Okafor

With beginner-level tech experience, he often finds himself navigating new apps with excitement, though his impulsive nature can lead him to make hasty decisions, particularly when it comes to managing his health. Chinedu is currently looking to refill his prescription in a casual and direct manner, as he values quick solutions that keep pace with his adaptable lifestyle.
